title: Bug 47910 - ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When using ajc outjar with a METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file inside, the resulting file does not contain the MANIFEST.MF file.
OB: When using ajc outjar with a METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file inside, the resulting jar file is missing the MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: If outjar is used with a METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file inside, the resulting file should be a valid jar file that contains the MANIFEST.MF file.
SR:
1. Prepare a METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file.
2. Use the ajc outjar command with the METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file.
3. Check the resulting jar file to confirm that it contains the METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file.
